attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the uncontrolled immigration into this country is ruining the quality of life for generations of british born people born and bred here, creating ghettos, and importing criminality here we have had enough,deprt al foreign criminals regardless of the staus of there own country send a clear message to illeagal, asylum seekers and have the political will to carry it out, even if it means withdrawing from this human rights law as it makes a mockery of britsh courts and justice.deport all foreign criminals
